title: Real annoying seeing my teammates ban nothing.
body:
Meanwhile, Jax and Zoe get let through and solo carry the game. 

I cannot wait for players to try and justify that "they don't want to ban anything", or "we have the right to ban nothing". So you're meaning to tell me that there isn't a single champion, out of 140~ champions in the game, that you just don't like playing against or think is strong? 

This isn't about you, it's about your team. You banning nothing is a giant "fuck you" to everyone elses face.
